WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​RelayCommand
ICommand
WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​RelayCommand
public
WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​RelayCommand​<T>
WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​RelayCommand

Command (Action) that can be executed based on an optional function that says whether or not the command can be run. This command can send a parameter to the Action to execute and the Predicate{T} that checks whether or not the Action should execute in the first place.

https://gist.github.com/schuster-rainer/2648922 with some modifications

Variables
_execute
readonly Action<T> _execute
_canExecute
readonly Predicate<T> _canExecute
Functions
RelayCommand
public RelayCommand(
Action<T> execute
)

Create a RelayCommand with a given Action and no optional function for whether or not the RelayCommand can execute

Parameter
execute
Action<T>

Action to call when this RelayCommand is executed

RelayCommand
public RelayCommand(
Action<T> execute,
Predicate<T> canExecute
)

Create a RelayCommand with a given Action and optional function for whether or not the RelayCommand can execute

Parameters
execute
Action<T>

Action to call when this RelayCommand is executed

canExecute
Predicate<T>

Predicate{T} function that determines whether or not the given Action should be executed or not

CanExecute
[DebuggerStepThrough]
public bool CanExecute(
object parameter
)

Determine whether or not this command shoudl execute

Parameter
parameter
object

Nullable object that will be sent to this command's function Predicate{T}

Returns

True if the command should run, false if the command should not be run

Events
CanExecuteChanged
public event EventHandler CanExecuteChanged { add; remove }

Event that is called when the command may have had its ability to be executed changed

Functions
Execute
public void Execute(
object parameter
)

Execute this command

Parameter
parameter
object

the nullable object parameter to send to the execution Action
